entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Grand Falls-Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:22 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Badger 04:30 AM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Temperature: -9.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -13.1°C
Wind: NE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023
